title: How to Purchase a Redbox DVD Rental Machine

steps.headline: Contact Redbox from the "Contact Redbox" link at the very bottom of the homepage.
Fill in and complete all applicable fields, filling in your business' name, address, as well as any other identifying information, for which they can get back to you with.
Fill in the message box, telling them that you'd like to have a machine installed (remember you cannot purchase the Redbox rental).
steps.description: Be sure to include how many visitors you receive to your business, on any given day, as Redbox won't give businesses with less than 15000 visitors a rental machine of their own.

steps.headline: Open up your email software or website daily.
steps.description: As most companies find emailing replies to be easy and free, check your email box for a reply from Redbox Customer Service Agents.

steps.headline: Complete any and all required paper (which should include the contract agreement.
steps.description: The contract agreement states that the business must consistently sell a specific amount of DVDs each month, in order to be able to keep the machine activated in the Redbox system. Make sure to also include a money order. Payment is necessary to buy a machine for your company.

steps.headline: Wait a week for Redbox to process your money order and required paperwork, that, by the end, will also include a purchasing agreement.
steps.description: Pending approval, within a week, you should have a machine at your business.

tyn: email software or email webpage (new email open and ready for typing)
location data for proposed location.  (Informative data is listed in Steps section above)
text: Open your web browser.  Visit the Redbox website.  Contact Redbox from the "Contact Redbox" link at the very bottom of the homepage.  Fill in and complete all applicable fields, filling in your business' name, address, as well as any other identifying information, for which they can get back to you with.  Fill in the message box, telling them that you'd like to have a machine installed (remember you cannot purchase the Redbox rental). Be sure to include how many visitors you receive to your business, on any given day, as Redbox won't give businesses with less than 15000 visitors a rental machine of their own. Open up your email software or website daily. As most companies find emailing replies to be easy and free, check your email box for a reply from Redbox Customer Service Agents. Complete any and all required paper (which should include the contract agreement. The contract agreement states that the business must consistently sell a specific amount of DVDs each month, in order to be able to keep the machine activated in the Redbox system. Make sure to also include a money order. Payment is necessary to buy a machine for your company. Wait a week for Redbox to process your money order and required paperwork, that, by the end, will also include a purchasing agreement. Pending approval, within a week, you should have a machine at your business.
sentences: Contact Redbox from the "Contact Redbox" link at the very bottom of the homepage.
Fill in and complete all applicable fields, filling in your business' name, address, as well as any other identifying information, for which they can get back to you with.
Fill in the message box, telling them that you'd like to have a machine installed (remember you cannot purchase the Redbox rental).
Be sure to include how many visitors you receive to your business, on any given day, as Redbox won't give businesses with less than 15000 visitors a rental machine of their own.
Open up your email software or website daily.
As most companies find emailing replies to be easy and free, check your email box for a reply from Redbox Customer Service Agents.
Complete any and all required paper (which should include the contract agreement.
The contract agreement states that the business must consistently sell a specific amount of DVDs each month, in order to be able to keep the machine activated in the Redbox system.
Make sure to also include a money order.
Payment is necessary to buy a machine for your company.
Wait a week for Redbox to process your money order and required paperwork, that, by the end, will also include a purchasing agreement.
Pending approval, within a week, you should have a machine at your business.
